title: Validate Clear email when members login to to Clear
custom_preconds:
Login site QA: https://qa-member-login.mlb.com/mlb-clear-sandbox.html
PROD:
User should have account with Clear (Ex, User name: sajadul.hussain@mlb.com & password
custom_steps:
1.Login to  https://qa-member-login.mlb.com/mlb-clear-sandbox.html
( Enter user name/password and click login

2. An email should be send to the user as soon the user login
custom_expected:
1.user should successfully login to 
Callback :https://sbx-clearme.cs64.force.com/apex/CommunityHomePage?uid=00uhplontu8lM9Yxl0h7

2. Email should be received

title: Validate Clear mailgun Email layout
custom_preconds: Email should be generated by login into the clear membership page
custom_steps:
1.Validated Email sender
2.MLB account update tittle should with MLB logo
3.Below message should be there
Looks like you signed into your MLB account to use CLEAR for ticketing at the ballpark. If you didn't initiate this request, please contact CLEAR at memberservices@clearme.com or 855-CLEARME (253-2763).
4. Below details should be in the gray-out areas
© 2021 MLB Advanced Media, L.P. MLB trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball. Visit MLB.com. Any other marks used herein are trademarks of their respective owners. 

Please review our privacy policy » 

You (sajadul.hussain@mlb.com) received this service related message as an MLB.com account holder. 

Please add MLB.com <tickets@qa-tickets.mlb.com> to your address book to ensure our messages reach your inbox. E-mail is mlb.com's primary communication for service-related communications and updates. 

Postal Address: mlb.com, c/o MLB Advanced Media, L.P., 1271 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY 10020. 
5.When user click on reply or reply all
6. show details option should be there and click on it
7. Please verify the attached email layout![](index.php?/attachments/get/8372323)
custom_expected:
1. Mlb.com <Tickets@qa_tickets.mlb.com>
2. LOGO and MLB account update should be in the email
3. Described message in steps should be present
4. Described message in steps should be present
5. To should have the same email address that the email came from
6. Show details should display "To" and "on"
7. Email layout should same exact same

title: Validate the GCP Cloud function and Mailgun log
custom_preconds: MailGun & GCP access
custom_steps:
1. Verify the log for generated clear email 
https://console.cloud.google.com/functions/details/us-east4/ticketing-memberLogin-qa?organizationId=93846768614&project=mlb-bbserv-ticketing-npd-e9b7&tab=logs
2. Validate the mailgun log
you can take a number of delivered email count and run your test to verfiy the number increase) 
https://app.mailgun.com/app/sending/domains/qa-tickets.mlb.com/logs?date_from=2021-02-19T00%3A00%3A00.000Z&date_to=2021-02-25T23%3A59%3A59.999Z
![](index.php?/attachments/get/8372324)
custom_expected:
1. Log should present for the generated email
2. you can verify the delivered email count and verify the test email is part of the event

title: Validate sender email for auto acceptance
Verify recipient email for auto acceptance
Verify sender email after recall (Cancel) an auto acceptance ticket
Verify recipient email after recall(cancel) an auto acceptance ticket
Verify sender email when sender sends a manual ticket forward
Verify recipient email of manual ticket forward invite
Verify sender email when he/she cancels the manual forwarded ticket before accepting it
Verify recipient email when sender cancel the manual forwarded ticket before accepting it
Verify sender email when recipient reject the manual forwarded tickets
Verify sender email for forward via link
Verify sender cancel ticket forwarded via link
Verify sender email when recipient reject invite forwarded via link
Verify sender email when recipient accept a manual forwarded ticket
Verify when recipient reply the manual ticket forward invite
Verify when sender revoke a single ticket from the bulk forward sender receives an email for the selected ticket only
custom_preconds:
WHEN
Sender initiate bulk forwards
AND
recipient auto accepted the ticket 
AND
Sender select one of the tickets to revoke
custom_steps:
GIVEN
sender revoke the forwarded ticket ( admin tool or BP app)
custom_expected:
THEN
Sender should see an email mentioned about the particular![](index.php?/attachments/get/13399311)
 revoked ticket only.

title: Verify when sender revoke a single ticket from the bulk forward recipient receives an email for the selected ticket only
custom_preconds:
WHEN
Sender initiate bulk forwards
AND
recipient auto accepted the ticket 
AND
Sender select one of the tickets to revoke
custom_steps:
GIVEN
sender revoke the forwarded ticket ( admin tool or BP app)
custom_expected:
THEN
Recipient should see an email mentioned about the particular![](index.php?/attachments/get/13399312)

title: Verify when sender revoke multiple tickets from the bulk forward sender receive email for the selected tickets
custom_preconds:
WHEN
Sender initiate bulk forwards
AND
recipient auto accepted the ticket 
AND
Sender select one of the tickets to revoke
custom_steps:
GIVEN
sender revoke the forwarded multiple tickets ( admin tool or BP app)
custom_expected:
THEN
Sender should see an email mentioned about the particular tickets

title: Verify when sender revoke multiple tickets from the bulk forward recipient receive email for the selected tickets
custom_preconds:
WHEN
Sender initiate bulk forwards
AND
recipient auto accepted the ticket 
AND
Sender select one of the tickets to revoke
custom_steps:
GIVEN
sender revoke the forwarded multiple tickets ( admin tool or BP app)
custom_expected:
THEN
Recipient should see an email mentioned about the particular tickets
